about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Mission: Christ-centered and modeled after Jesus, we carry God's truth and love through digital media and artistic innovation, bringing faith into everyday life so people walk with God daily. Vision: Build a global platform that unites digital media with Christian faith, becoming a vessel God can use to deliver Scripture through cultural creativity, artistic immersion, and lifestyle products in fresh and compelling ways.

founder.title: Core Values and Business Pillars
founder.description1:
Core Values:
1. Gospel-Centered - Every product and service is grounded in Scripture.
2. Creativity as a Bridge - Use art, digital media, and design to reach the next generation.
3. Faith in Everyday Life - Bring Christ's love beyond church walls into daily living.
4. Global Perspective - Craft art and products that resonate with international audiences.
founder.description2: Digital Media Experiences: Immersive Bible culture journeys that blend ancient Scripture with modern technology, featuring the 3D BOX immersive show, Bible Hologram Theater, Bible Light & Sound spectacles, VR Sunday School, Eden Interactive Playground for kids, and the 3D Immersive Mission Van. Highlights: Integrates VR, AR, and holographic projection, scales across churches, expos, and mission fields worldwide, and lays the groundwork for a digital Gospel theme park.
founder.description3: Bible Commemorative Art Gifts: Laser-etched metal pieces, carved wood collectibles, laser relief artworks, and original textured painting albums delivered as premium, customizable, and limited-edition collections that pair with exhibitions. Carry the Cross Lifestyle Essentials: Faith-infused everyday, home, office, and in-car products that embrace an international design language ("Cross x Fashion") and connect physical items with metaverse identities for dual digital-physical engagement.

mission.title: Business Model and Target Markets
mission.description: Business Model: B2C via the official store, art halls, and exhibitions, plus retail partnerships with Christian bookstores, churches, and festivals; B2B collaborations with churches, missions, schools, museums, and cultural venues for VR curricula and immersive projects; IP licensing to designer brands, gift houses, and publishers; memberships and subscriptions for annual VR Sunday School access and Bible Art Collectors programs. Target Markets: Core focus on churches, schools, ministries, and Christian families; expansion to younger audiences, art lovers, and designers; global reach to regions with significant Christian populations across North America, Europe, Southeast Asia, and Africa.

vision.title: Advantages, Roadmap, and Partnership Invitation
vision.description: Competitive Advantages: The only platform merging Bible culture with leading-edge digital technology, delivering a diversified revenue ecosystem, international aesthetics, and high-growth potential in immersive experiences and art collecting. Growth Roadmap: Short term (1-2 years) launch the first immersive light show and art gift line while building brand influence; mid term (3-5 years) expand VR Sunday School and the mobile mission van to enter global markets; long term (5-10 years) develop a full Bible digital theme park and global art hub. Investment & Partnerships: Funding supports technology R&D, artistic creation, brand marketing, and supply-chain buildout. We welcome equity partnerships, joint ventures, IP licensing, and distribution alliances. Partner Highlights: Capture returns from the convergence of immersive entertainment, collectible art, and faith-based lifestyle goods while advancing a cultural mission with lasting spiritual value.
